changeSet.author: rfricke@broadinstitute.org
changeSet.comment: We want to be able to allow each terra data repo source to be able to specify the rate in which they poll for a new snapshot. The new column added to TerraDataRepoSource will allow us to keep track of what the interval is for each workload's source.
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE TerraDataRepoSource ADD polling_interval INTEGER;
